title: The Ultimate Guide to Become a Shein Brand or Campus Ambassador

steps.title: Fill out the application on Shein’s official website.
steps.content: Fill out the application on Shein’s official website. Log into your Shein account, go to the #SHEINpartner page , scroll to the bottom, and click “I’m an Influencer.” Follow the directions on screen to fill out the application, then hit “Submit” once you’re done. If you’re chosen to be an ambassador, Shein will send you a follow-up email within 7-10 business days. The application asks for your name, email address, age, social media handles, and proof of your social media follower count (via uploading photos).

steps.title: Alternatively, send a pitching email to blogservice@shein.com.
steps.content: Alternatively, send a pitching email to blogservice@shein.com. Briefly introduce yourself and express interest in becoming a brand ambassador. Include links to your social media accounts so their team can see your follower count and engagement rate, and explain how you can help them increase sales and bring in more customers. [1] X Research source Shein will reply to your email if you meet their requirements and then you can negotiate a contract with them. Think of your pitching email as a cover letter for a job. Highlight your strengths and ask a friend to read over it to check for any errors. If you don’t have a lot of followers, ask for a gifting opportunity instead. This allows you to get free products, as long as you post product reviews and use their required hashtags. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Check if you meet the program’s general requirements.
steps.content: Check if you meet the program’s general requirements. Before applying to become a Shein brand ambassador, read through the terms and conditions of the program to ensure you’re eligible: [3] X Research source You’re at least 18 years old. You’re currently enrolled in a college or university in the United States. You’re authorized to work in the United States. You acknowledge, understand, and accept that you’re applying for a referral commission program. You acknowledge and understand that you’re responsible for reporting and paying any federal or state taxes in connection with your commission.

steps.title: Fill out the application on Shein’s official website.
steps.content: Fill out the application on Shein’s official website. Login into your Shein account, go to the Campus Ambassador Program page, and hit “Apply Now.” Follow the directions on screen to input your contact information and social media links, then hit “Submit” when you’re done. [4] X Research source If you’re chosen to be a campus ambassador, you will receive an acceptance email within 1-2 weeks. [5] X Research source If you don’t hear back from them or have any additional questions, shoot an email to campus@sheingroup.com. The application is only open from the 1st to the 20th of each month, so try to apply as early as possible to make sure they receive it in time.

steps.title: Post engaging content to your social media accounts and tag Shein.
steps.content: Post engaging content to your social media accounts and tag Shein. Take high-quality photos and videos of yourself wearing Shein products, and upload your content to Instagram, YouTube, or TikTok. Tag @sheinofficial and add relevant hashtags to boost your visibility and engagement online. [6] X Research source Popular hashtags include: #shein, #sheingals, #sheincurve, #sheinhaul, and #sheinoutfits. If you post something on Instagram, add it to your stories so it automatically goes to Shein’s DMs (and increases the chances of the brand noticing you). [7] X Research source

steps.title: Experiment with your posting schedule to get more engagement.
steps.content: Experiment with your posting schedule to get more engagement. Post your photos and videos during different times of the day to see when you get more likes , views, and comments. [8] X Research source Upload your content during these peak times so you look more capable of influencing others to buy from Shein. If you get a lot of engagement, Shein might contact you directly to become an ambassador! If you have a Creator or Business profile on Instagram, look at the Insights panel to see when your followers are the most active and post during these times.

steps.title: Be strategic about which platform you post your content.
steps.content: Be strategic about which platform you post your content. To maximize your engagement rate, consider the features and audience for each social media platform before posting: If you want to share outfit photos from Shein, it’s probably best to upload them to Instagram since it’s the most popular photo-sharing app. If you want to post a short makeup tutorial, it’s probably best to upload it onto TikTok, while a longer product review makes more sense for YouTube.

steps.title: Showcase your styling skills and creativity.
steps.content: Showcase your styling skills and creativity. Browse Shein’s social media accounts and Shein-related hashtags to see how other people are putting their outfits together. Then, try to create a unique look to stand out from the crowd and get noticed. If you see everyone is styling joggers with sneakers, for example, you could pair them with heels, boots, or slides instead.

steps.title: Attend Shein events to connect with the brand in person.
steps.content: Attend Shein events to connect with the brand in person. Follow Shein’s official social media accounts and their brand ambassadors to see if there’s an upcoming pop-up in your area. If possible, network with the people hosting the event to get noticed and ask for tips to increase your chance of becoming an ambassador.

steps.title: Interact with Shein’s social media accounts to increase your visibility.
steps.content: Interact with Shein’s social media accounts to increase your visibility. Like and comment on their posts regularly, and share their content so they’re more likely to notice you. The person running Shein’s accounts might click on your page and become interested in collaborating with you.

steps.title: 10k+ followers on IG and YouTube and 15k+ followers on TikTok.
steps.content: 10k+ followers on IG and YouTube and 15k+ followers on TikTok. Even if you don’t have this many followers, Shein could still contact you to become an ambassador. They’re known to work with “micro-influencers,” or people with less than 5k followers, but they prefer candidates who post content regularly, have non-private accounts, and meet the following metrics: [9] X Research source Instagram: 10k+ followers and 1k+ likes per post TikTok: 15k+ followers and 1k+ likes per video YouTube: 10k+ followers and 1k+ likes per video

steps.title: Campus ambassadors earn 3% commission on total sales.
steps.content: Campus ambassadors earn 3% commission on total sales. If someone uses your unique referral code or link, you earn a 3% commission on the total purchase of their order, excluding sales tax, shipping costs, and returns. [10] X Research source

steps.title: Brand ambassadors earn between 10-20% commission on total sales.
steps.content: Brand ambassadors earn between 10-20% commission on total sales. While earnings depend on the terms of your specific contract, the average total pay for a Shein Fashion Ambassador is $49,174 per year. [11] X Research source
